28 QNode::QNode(int argc, char** argv, QObject *parent) :
29  init_argc(argc),
30  init_argv(argv),
31  QThread(parent)
32  {}
33 
34 QNode::~QNode() {
35  //delete _playback_client;
36  //delete _record_client;
37  if(ros::isStarted()) {
38  ros::shutdown(); // explicitly needed since we use ros::start();
39  ros::waitForShutdown();
40  }
41  wait();
42 }
43 
44 bool QNode::init() {
45  ros::init(init_argc,init_argv,"pumpkin_qt");
46  if ( ! ros::master::check() ) {
47  return false;
48  }
49  ros::start(); // explicitly needed since our nodehandle is going out of scope.
50  ros::NodeHandle n;
51  // Add your ros communications here.
52  _file_client = n.serviceClient<pumpkin_messages::Files>("file_lister");
53  ROS_INFO("Waiting for \"file_lister\" ros server.");
54  _file_client.waitForExistence();
55  ROS_INFO("Server \"file_lister\" found.");
56  start();
57  return true;
58 }
59 
60 void QNode::run() {
61  double rate = 100;
62  if (ros::param::has("/pumpkin/config/ros_rate")) {
63  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/config/ros_rate", rate);
64  }
65  ros::Rate loop_rate(rate);
66  while ( ros::ok() ) {
67  ros::spinOnce();
68  loop_rate.sleep();
69  }
70  std::cout << "Ros shutdown, proceeding to close the gui." << std::endl;
71  Q_EMIT rosShutdown(); // used to signal the gui for a shutdown (useful to roslaunch)
72 }
73 
74 void QNode::callFiles() {
75  pumpkin_messages::Files msg;
76  msg.request.type = static_cast<uint8_t>(pumpkin_messages::FileType::PlaybackFile);
77  if (!_file_client.call(msg)) {
78  ROS_FATAL("Could not load the files directory");
79  ros::shutdown();
80  return; //for security reasons
81  }
82  ROS_INFO("Paths loaded");
83  Q_EMIT filesReady(QString::fromStdString(msg.response.base_path), std::move(msg.response.files));
84 }
85 
86 void QNode::callConfigFiles()
87 {
88  pumpkin_messages::Files msg;
89  msg.request.type = static_cast<uint8_t>(pumpkin_messages::FileType::ConfigFile);
90  if (!_file_client.call(msg)) {
91  ROS_FATAL("Could not load the files directory");
92  ros::shutdown();
93  return; //for security reasons
94  }
95  ROS_INFO("Config file list loaded.");
96  Q_EMIT(configFilesReady(QString::fromStdString(msg.response.base_path + "/" + msg.response.files[0].folder), msg.response.files[0].filenames));
97 }
98
